name: Russian Hentai 2
description:
Continuation of the first part of Russian Hentai. This time you have to fight with hentai dolls typical of the inhabitants of Russia. Your task is to find all groups of enemies and destroy them. Your enemies are armed with machine guns. You have at your disposal 6 types of different weapons. The action takes place on the streets of a Russian city.

  • 1 beautiful map
  • 6 types of weapons
  • Advanced AI
